Topic.Title: Why Does My Imposter's Tongue-ing Girlfriend Soil Her Silly Sullied Self Daily?

Message.Msg: "I would strongly suggest you forget about spell-checker and opt for an online grammar-checker." Well put, moonbat! Yes. And you point out her main weakness here in a better tone than I. Sometimes I have to point out the cold hard truth, no matter the tone. Such is the manner with TEAM. But, she needs both spell check and grammar check. Look at one of her more recent "sentences": "Anytime you circle jerkers NOTIcES (sic) cERTAIN blatant illiteracy squeak away" -Sully Rules
